content:
Emaad's celebration of his victory was cut short when it was announced that there was a mistake in the judges' scorecards and that Mustafa was actually the winner. The boxing community was stunned, and Emaad was devastated.

An investigation was launched, and it was discovered that Mustafa had bribed the judges in order to secure a victory. He had taken advantage of Emaad's good nature and sportsmanship, and had cheated to win the fight.

The news of Mustafa's cheating sent shockwaves through the boxing world, and he was stripped of his title and banned from competition for several years. Emaad, on the other hand, was hailed as a hero for his integrity and sportsmanship.

In the end, the hyped boxing match between Emaad and Mustafa became a cautionary tale about the dangers of cheating and the importance of fair play. Despite the difficult circumstances, Emaad had refused to cheat and had fought a clean fight. His reputation as a fair and honest athlete was solidified, and he went on to have a successful career in the ring.
